article_title: Supreme Court ruling restricting presidential powers is just what the Constitution orders
article_text: April Kelly-Woessner is a professor and chairwoman of the political science department at Elizabethtown College. She also is a correspondent for Lancaster Newspapers Inc. Email her at woessnerak@etown.edu

article_metadata.news_keywords: , supreme court, ruling, president barack obama, congress, national labor relations board, appointments
article_metadata.author: April Kelly-Woessner

og.description: The Supreme Court ruled correctly that President Barack Obama did not have the authority to appoint members to the National Labor Relations Board while the Senate was in pro forma
